title: Fab City Summit
content: An annual event that brings together the global Fab City Network to share knowledge, collaborate on projects, and advance the Fab City agenda.

title: Fab City Awards
content: Recognizing and celebrating the most innovative and impactful projects from the Fab City Network.

title: Fab City Challenge
content: A global competition that invites teams to develop solutions for local problems using digital fabrication and other technologies.

title: Full Stack Bootcamp
content: An intensive training program that equips participants with the skills to design and manage a Fab City stack.
